markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pelagic Aptitude](/Feats.aspx?ID=2300) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've learned special tricks to survive underwater. You gain the trained proficiency rank in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16). When in an aquatic environment, if you roll a critical failure on a Survival skill check to [Sense Direction](/Actions.aspx?ID=64) or [Subsist](/Actions.aspx?ID=27), you get a failure instead.
name: Pelagic Aptitude

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Pelagic Aptitude Source Ancestry Guide pg. 14 2.0 --- You've learned special tricks to survive underwater. You gain the trained proficiency rank in Survival. When in an aquatic environment, if you roll a critical failure on a Survival skill check to Sense Direction or Subsist, you get a failure instead.
